channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Well i order a book of amazon called "Php and mySQL for dummies" i have another 2 comming also C++ for dummies and java for dummies
i just wanted to know will these books help me to create and understand RSPS?
Php and mysql would it help me make Highscores ect...

item.description:

There big i can tell you that its gunna take me for ever to get thought 3 books…!

I hope there not becuase i have nearly spent like £50 on these books… lol

item.title: Question

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:
